trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_MARIORIE_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Might I take your presence here to mean you are willing to grace us with an encore performance? If so, I shall be happy to send for your fellow performers at once!
TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_MARIORIE_000_001<tab>Oh, and if you'd like to try your hand at a more challenging composition this time, I'd be happy to procure another score.
TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_MARIORIE_000_003<tab>Oh, but forgive me. I did not mean to pressure you so. Whenever you feel in the mood to perform, you need only say the word.
TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>When the performance begins, the orchestra will perform a song. Time your inputs with the on-screen prompts.

TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>When a blue prompt appears (left), time your input as the diamonds overlap. When an orange prompt appears (center), make several rapid inputs until the prompt disappears. When a red prompt appears (right), press and hold the input for the duration of the prompt.

TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_SYSTEM_000_007<tab><var 08 E4E95101 ((Mouse: Left-click or right-click anywhere on screen Keyboard: Any standard, unmodified key Please note that chat will be temporarily disabled.)) ((<var 08 E1E94C01 ((Controller)) ((Gamepad)) /var>: All buttons and directional buttons except <var 1E 13 /var>)) /var>

TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>To access the Pause menu, press the <var 08 E4E94F04 ((esc)) ((Esc)) /var> key or <var 1E 13 /var> button, from which you may choose to end the performance.

TEXT_REGROC2MARIORIE_00707_MARIORIE_000_999<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I am making the necessary preparations for an encore performance as we speak. Pray stop back a bit later if you feel inclined to share in the joy of music once more.
